}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Broadcom Mini PCI ([[Buffalo WLI-MPCI-G54]]) card on a Mini PCI -> PCI adapter
"PI101_V00" and "109-001-2000" is silkscreened on the PCI board under the wireless module (and behind the shield).
The device appears to have a MC connector.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
